con:config.script: import jxl.* def excelFilePath = "/Users/rafal/Downloads/Data+for+BLZService.xls" File excelFile = new File(excelFilePath) Workbook workbook = Workbook.getWorkbook(excelFile) Sheet sheet = workbook.getSheet(0) int noOfRows = sheet.getRows()-1 log.info "No of Rows = $noOfRows" for(int rowIdx in 1..noOfRows){ log.warn '-------------------------------------------------------' blz = sheet.getCell(0, rowIdx).getContents() bez = sheet.getCell(1, rowIdx).getContents() bic = sheet.getCell(2, rowIdx).getContents() ort = sheet.getCell(3, rowIdx).getContents() plz = sheet.getCell(4, rowIdx).getContents() log.info "blz = $blz, bez = $bez, bic = $bic, ort = $ort, plz = $plz" log.warn '-------------------------------------------------------' } workbook.close()
